article_text: Rarely does a week go by without another study indicating the fiscal and medical benefits of Medicaid expansion. States that have it increasingly appear healthier and smarter. It’s time for Kansas and Missouri to move out of the control group.

article_metadata.title: More benefits of Medicaid expansion under Obamacare emerge in diabetes study | The Kansas City Star

article_summary:
It’s time for Kansas and Missouri to move out of the control group.
Rarely does a week go by without another study indicating the fiscal and medical benefits of Medicaid expansion.
States that have it increasingly appear healthier and smarter.
